##Kitabayashi's collection of prose poems-warning of a global epidemic on the eve of an outbreak

Micro Signal DeepWorld1

Function introduction, news for the weak voice, observation for the collective direction. Learning for the popularization of science, travel notes for the world. Prose is self-examination, poetry is a tribute to life. As a penguin in the library

To write a poem about a disaster,

Trying to capture every angle with words.

Suddenly, the vlog couldn't do it all.

An endless misery,

Is Anyone ever ready?

Confidence, revelry, panic, sadness.

Ten million billion people are quietly trying to,

In exchange for someone else's house to live in.

Groups of doctors went to the front,

To Save Wuhan, Hubei Province, where there are no doctors.

This is a disaster that's GONNA kill a lot of people.

I got a lot of letters asking for help,

Mostly people with other diseases.

Where should they go?

Ask The street sweeper who doesn't have a new mask,

You'll find that people can't call an ambulance, can't dial 110;

They have nowhere else to go but home to endure.

What can I say to comfort my friend's company?

It's over. Shall we start over?

I can let bygones be bygones and just reflect,

But what are we doing right now?

The real nose of the media, reviled.

Early Warning Message, unable to spread.

Why do people Zombie so quickly before the real disaster strikes.

They can't see that the dead heroes are nobody.

These people do the right thing, save the world, get called assholes.

The global epidemic is still in its incubation period. May people everywhere be aware of the crisis.

This... isn't over.

Like swine fever and bird flu, like plague and AIDS.

Never healed, only postponed.

A collection of prose poems by beilin-forewarning that the global plague is on the eve of breaking out

WECHAT SWEEPS UP Praise for author

####Send it to the author

People Admire

Long-press the QR code to transfer the funds to me

Under apple's new rules, wechat's iOS version of the APP has been turned off to support public accounts through Qr code transfers.

Go to "discover"-"take a look" browse "friends watching"

Sent

####Send it to take a look

Sending

Leave a message

A scan of wechat
Pay attention to the account
